sign_in_continue: Sign in to continue to Dermacare
join_dermacare: Join Dermacare to start your journey

start_quiz_desc: Test your knowledge and earn new badges!
chat_greeting: Hi! Ask me anything about skin health or a specific condition.
main_greeting: How can I help you with your skin health today?
disclaimer: Dermacare may display inaccurate info. Always consult a medical professional.
faq_q1: How accurate is the skin condition scanner?
faq_a1: Our AI model is trained on a vast dataset of clinical images and achieves high accuracy. However, it is an informational tool and not a substitute for professional medical diagnosis. Always consult a certified dermatologist for any health concerns.
faq_q2: Is my data private and secure?
faq_a2: Yes. We use Firebase, a Google platform, which employs industry-standard security measures. Your scan images are stored securely, and our Firestore rules ensure that only you can access your personal data.
faq_q3: Can I use Dermacare to get a prescription?
faq_a3: No. Dermacare is an informational and tracking tool. It does not provide medical advice, diagnoses, or prescriptions. We can provide information about common treatments, but you must see a doctor to receive a prescription.
about_desc: Dermacare is an AI-powered skin health assistant designed to help you understand, track, and learn about various skin conditions. Our goal is to provide accessible information and empower you on your journey to healthier skin.
instant_analysis_desc: Upload a clear photo of your skin concern, and our AI will provide an instant analysis and information.
scan_failed_message: An error occurred during the scan.
carousel_subtitle1: Why SPF is your best friend for life.

carousel_subtitle3: The foundation of every good routine.
